comments.comment: FileNode contains pointer onto original FileStorage instance which is destroyed. FileStorageImpl contains pointers on FileNode instances through the "roots" field. This is design bug - FileStorage* in FileNode must be replaced by its pimpl FileStorageImpl instance (through cv::Ptr).

Valgrind can't detect issue with tests because FileStorage variables are on the stack. This updated test code triggers "use after free" errors through valgrind. <denchmark-code> cv::FileStorage fs; { cv::FileStorage* fs2 = new cv::FileStorage(fname, cv::FileStorage::READ); fs = *fs2; delete fs2; } </denchmark-code>
